attributes.action: Create a New Independent Skilled Worker Visa Route
attributes.additional_details:
The purpose of this visa is to:
Address skill shortages more effectively
Reduce worker exploitation linked to employer-dependent visas
Enable non-citizens to contribute productively to the UK economy
Maintain clear safeguards to protect public resources and immigration control
attributes.background: This proposal recommends the creation of a new Independent Skilled Worker Visa (ISWV) that allows qualified foreign nationals to work in the UK without being tied to a sponsoring employer.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action:

Create a Renewable Open Work Permit for Sponsored Workers 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/751532
